	*Wiki settings: General, page titles*
	----
&bull; *Title prefix*
Control the heading level of the initial main title of new pages. See PagePageTitles

&bull; *Wikiword to title*
How should the main title of new pages be generated from the wikiword. See PagePageTitles

&bull; *Use link title if present*
Specifies if the link title will be used as title of the page. See PagePageTitles
